name: Stephen A. Brewster
content: The Glasgow Multimodal Interaction Group HomePage incorporating the Earcons HomePage Multimodal Interaction Group Home Page The group now has a new website located at mig.dcs.gla.ac.uk If your browser doesn't automatically go there within a few seconds, you may want to click the link Prof Stephen Brewster School of Computing Science University of Glasgow Glasgow, G12 8QQ, UK Tel: +44 (0)141 330 4966 Fax: +44 (0)141 330 4913 Email: stephen.brewster@glasgow.ac.uk
